page.title: 17Street Traders
page.content: Sometimes the tradesman still comes to us rather than us going to him. The milkman is still the most common visitor of this kind. We can also see the ice-cream van in the street and the occasional mobile shop usually selling greengroceries. The rag and bone man still shouts out his cries while the ice-cream van uses its mechanical chimes to tell us it has arrived in the street. We can also see the window cleaner selling his services for money. We see people delivering what we have already bought from a shop, such as our newspapers delivered daily.
